09-YBmmYJN8_000000_000005.ko: 마지막으로 할 이야기가 없냐고 이제 어머니가 물어보셨거든요, 아버지한테.
09-YBmmYJN8_000000_000005.en: My mother asked my father if he had anything to say for the last time.

09-YBmmYJN8_000005_000008.ko: 니는 잘해라, 이거 딱 말이 끝이었거든요.

09-YBmmYJN8_000008_000010.en: The was the last word I heard.

09-YBmmYJN8_000011_000018.ko: 아마 아버님의 그 말씀 안에는 굉장히 많은 의미가 들어가 있었던 것 같아요.
09-YBmmYJN8_000011_000018.en: Maybe there was a great deal of meaning in your father's words.

09-YBmmYJN8_000018_000025.ko: 왜냐하면 더 이상 잘할 수 없을 만큼 잘 해왔다, 니가 내 아들이라서 정말 너무 고맙다.
09-YBmmYJN8_000018_000025.en: Because you've done so well that you can't do it better than this. Thank you so much for being my son.

09-YBmmYJN8_000025_000029.ko: 어우 야. 내가 눈물이 날라 그래요.
09-YBmmYJN8_000025_000029.en: Oh, my. I'm about to cry.

09-YBmmYJN8_000033_000039.ko: 난 더 이상 너한테 할 말이 없고 너무나 행복했다, 고맙다 아들아, 그리고 너한테 부탁할 게 없다.
09-YBmmYJN8_000033_000039.en: I had nothing more to say to you, and I was so happy. Thank you, son. And I have nothing to ask of you.

09-YBmmYJN8_000039_000041.en: Because you just have to do what you do now.

09-YBmmYJN8_000041_000046.ko: 나는 너를 믿고 떠난다, 니가 있어서 든든하다.
09-YBmmYJN8_000041_000046.en: I trust you, so I can leave now.  I'm glad you're here.

09LyXsvPnEg_000002_000004.ko: 걷는 거 보니까 다리가 불편하세요? 네.
09LyXsvPnEg_000002_000004.en: Do you feel uncomfortable walking? Yes.

09LyXsvPnEg_000004_000010.en: It's uncomfortable to walk because my legs are turned inside.

09LyXsvPnEg_000019_000022.en: They've already been friends for seven years.

09LyXsvPnEg_000022_000027.ko: 아픈 친구를 위해 혜선이는 같은 고등학교를 지원했다.
09LyXsvPnEg_000022_000027.en: For her sick friend, Hyesun applied to the same high school.

09LyXsvPnEg_000027_000029.ko: 혜선아 나 윤리 안 가지고 왔어.

09LyXsvPnEg_000029_000032.en: I have it in my locker. Oh really?

09LyXsvPnEg_000032_000033.en: Stay here. I'll go get it.

09LyXsvPnEg_000038_000045.ko: 그런데 놀랍게도 걸음을 내딛는 혜선이의 모습이 친구와 꼭 닮아 있다.
09LyXsvPnEg_000038_000045.en: Surprisingly, however, Hyesun looks exactly like her friend when she takes a step.

09LyXsvPnEg_000049_000058.ko: 게다가 걷는 모습만 봤을 때는 혜성이의 다리가 영선이보다 더 좋지 않아 보이는데.
09LyXsvPnEg_000049_000058.en: And from the way she walks, Hyesung's legs look worse than Youngsun's.

09LyXsvPnEg_000059_000107.ko: 초등학교 때부터 제가 많이 불편했었는데 그때부터 혜선이가 제 옆에 있었거든요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000059_000107.en: I was really uncomfortable since elementary school, but Hyesun was next to me since then.

09LyXsvPnEg_000107_000114.ko: 그래서 옆에서 계속 지켜봐주고 끝날 때 하교, 등하교 같이 해 주고.
09LyXsvPnEg_000107_000114.en: So, you was watching me from the side and go home at the end. She come and go to school with me.

09LyXsvPnEg_000113_000122.ko: 더욱 믿을 수 없는 것은 지난 7년간 영선이를 돌봐준 친구가 더욱 몸이 불편해 보이는 혜선이었다는 사실이다.
09LyXsvPnEg_000113_000122.en: What is even more unbelievable is that the friend who has taken care of Youngsun for the past seven years has been Hyesun, who looks more uncomfortable.

09LyXsvPnEg_000124_000127.ko: 내가 물 떠다 줄까? 아 진짜?
09LyXsvPnEg_000124_000127.en: Do you want me to get you some water? Oh really?

09LyXsvPnEg_000130_000134.en: Yeah, I'll be back. Should I come with you?

09LyXsvPnEg_000137_000143.ko: 제 몸이 더 불편하면서도 살뜰히 친구를 챙기는 아이.
09LyXsvPnEg_000137_000143.en: A child who takes care of her friends while feeling more uncomfortable.

09LyXsvPnEg_000143_000146.en: I think she's going to fall.

09LyXsvPnEg_000149_000153.ko: 아니 혜선이도 지금 걷는 게 불편하잖아요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000149_000153.en: It's uncomfortable for Hyesun to walk right now.

09LyXsvPnEg_000153_000158.ko: 넘어지는 건 영선이가 더 많아서 제가 대신 갖다주고 그래요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000153_000158.en: Youngsun has more to fall over, so I give it to her instead.

09LyXsvPnEg_000205_000209.en: But the more surprising story is from now.

09LyXsvPnEg_000211_000214.ko: 두 친구 지금 무슨 병을 앓고 있는 거예요?
09LyXsvPnEg_000211_000214.en: What kind of disease are you suffering from?

09LyXsvPnEg_000219_000224.ko: 가슴 아래쪽부터 다리가 경직이 되는 그런 병이에요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000219_000224.en: It's a disease that makes your legs stiff from the bottom of your chest.

09LyXsvPnEg_000225_000239.ko: 경직성 하지마비는 척추 신경에 이상이 생겨 뇌의 운동 조절 신호가 하지에 제대로 전달되지 않는 희귀난치병으로 시간이 지날수록 점점 증상이 심해져간다.
09LyXsvPnEg_000225_000239.en: Inflexible paraplegia is a rare and incurable disease in which the brain's motor control signal is not properly transmitted to the lower extremities due to abnormalities in the spinal nerves, and symptoms are getting worse over time.

09LyXsvPnEg_000239_000244.en: It suddenly got weird when I was in 5th grade.

09LyXsvPnEg_000244_000253.ko: 그러니까 이렇게 길을 가고 있었는데 아무도, 아무도 그냥 계속 다 쳐다보는 거예요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000244_000253.en: I was walking down the street, but everyone. Everyone was just staring at me.

09LyXsvPnEg_000250_000258.ko: 어, 왜 그러지하고 거울 앞에 제가 서서 걸어가는 걸 봤어요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000250_000258.en: I saw myself walking in front of the mirror.

09LyXsvPnEg_000258_000301.en: But it was weird even for me.

09LyXsvPnEg_000304_000312.ko: 더욱 놀라운 건 아픈 영선이를 돌보던 혜선이에게도 어느 날 갑자기 똑같은 증상이 나타난 것.
09LyXsvPnEg_000304_000312.en: What's more surprising is that Hyesun, who was taking care of sick Youngsun, suddenly had the same symptoms one day.

09LyXsvPnEg_000313_000316.en: It's been like that since last summer.

09LyXsvPnEg_000318_000321.en: I don't know. All of a sudden.

09LyXsvPnEg_000322_000327.ko: 아무 이유 없이 사고도 안 났는데 아무 이유 없이.
09LyXsvPnEg_000322_000327.en: There was no accident, but for no reason.

09LyXsvPnEg_000328_000339.ko: 불과 1년 전만 해도 아무런 이상이 없던 혜선이의 다리가 지난 여름 갑자기 병을 앓고 있던 친구처럼 안쪽으로 휘어지기 시작했다는데.
09LyXsvPnEg_000328_000339.en: Hyesun's legs, which had nothing wrong just a year ago, suddenly began to bend inward like a friend who was suffering from a disease last summer.

09LyXsvPnEg_000339_000345.ko: 둘이 친하니까 아 영선이가 혜선이 따라하는구나 이런 생각도 했었어요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000339_000345.en: Since they're close, I thought Youngsun is copying Hyesun.

09LyXsvPnEg_000345_000348.ko: 걸음 맞춰주기 위해 따라하나 이런 생각도 하고.
09LyXsvPnEg_000345_000348.en: I thought that she's copying me to keep my pace.

09LyXsvPnEg_000348_000352.en: Even Youngsun thought that at first.

09LyXsvPnEg_000352_000401.ko: 그런데 이제 혜선이가 지금은 점점 증상이 심해져서 영선이보다 더 걷는 자체는 더 훨씬 더 불편한 상태거든요.
09LyXsvPnEg_000352_000401.en: But Hyesun's symptoms are getting worse now, so walking more than Youngsun is a lot more uncomfortable.
